bibl.title: Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the Joint American Institute of Archaeology and American Philological Association meeting, Boston, January 7, 2005. - On the interdisciplinary commonalities between the archaeology of Graeco-Roman Egypt and papyrology.

bibl.title: Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning

bibl.seg: GAGOS Traianos, Jennifer E. GATES and Andrew T. WILBURN, Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning. Avec résumé en anglais.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor-in-Chief), Jennifer E. GATES, Andrew T. WILBURN (Guest Editors), Timothy RENNER, John WHITEHORNE (Editors), Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning = BASP 42 (2005) Special Thematic Section, pp. 171-188.

Paper presented at the Joint American Institute of Archaeology and American Philological Association meeting, Boston, January 7, 2005. - On the interdisciplinary commonalities between the archaeology of Graeco-Roman Egypt and papyrology.
